backend/escalation-status-helper.mo: Defines the EscalationStatus variant type with five possible status tags.
backend/main.mo: Main backend actor handling user profiles and full escalation CRUD logic, including ID generation, status types, authorization checks, and length-of-escalation computation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two frontend features related to properly using backend escalation IDs across navigation and data flow.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files covering routing, queries, components, filters, tables, forms, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication bootstrap, profile handling, and routing for escalation list, detail, create, and edit pages.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main application layout with navigation, profile display, logout handling, and page container structure.
frontend/src/components/AuthBootstrapErr: Displays initialization errors for authenticated users with logout option and detailed error message.
frontend/src/components/escalations/Dele: A confirmation dialog for permanently deleting an escalation, showing its title and handling disabled states while deleting.
frontend/src/components/escalations/Esca: A form for creating or editing an escalation, handling field inputs, timestamps, and computed escalation duration.
A filter panel allowing users to filter escalations by status, functional area, business group, and other fields with reset support.
Displays aggregated escalation counts grouped by status, functional area, and business group in summary cards.
A sortable table listing escalations with status labels, formatted dates, and navigation to the escalation detail view.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new users to enter their name and saving the profile on submit.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEscalationsFilters: Provides filtering, summaries, and unique value extraction for escalation lists based on multiple criteria.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on user profiles and escalations using an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for the app's design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Page for creating a new escalation using a form and submitting via a mutation.
Displays detailed escalation information with options to edit or delete an escalation.
frontend/src/pages/EscalationEditPage.ts: Page for editing an existing escalation, loading initial data and submitting updates.
frontend/src/pages/EscalationsListPage.t: Shows dashboard, filters, summaries, and table view of all escalations using query data.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a login screen that triggers Internet Identity authentication and displays login status or errors.
frontend/src/utils/escalationLength.ts: Provides functions to compute full days since a creation timestamp and format that duration as a display string.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: JSON describing project metadata, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions for the app.
